<Text: 8th Wonder is the second album by rap group The Sugarhill Gang.>

Text: 8th Wonder (The Sugarhill Gang album):  Though not as successful as the group's previous album, the album did feature the minor hits "8th Wonder" and "Apache" and featured an appearance by another Sugar Hill Records rap group, Grandmaster Flash and the Furious Five.
